    External

    External Integration Code and Examples

    This directory contains some code, configuration, and examples of how to integrate MLOS with external projects.

    For instance:

    • The cmake directory contains an MLOS module for use in projects using the cmake build system.
    • ExternalIntegrationExample contains a stripped down example showing how to use it.
    • leveldb contains a notebook and other examples of using portions of the MLOS toolkit to tune LevelDb parameters.
